text: Antonio Martino (22 December 1942 - 5 March 2022) was an Italian politician. He was the minister of foreign affairs in 1994 and minister of defense from 2001 to 2006 during the Silvio Berlusconi governments. He was a founding member of Forza Italia. Martino died on 5 March 2022 in Rome, aged 79.Morto l'ex ministro e fondatore di Forza Italia Antonio Martino ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Sicily Category:Italian economists Category:Italian educators Category:People from Messina
title: Antonio Martino
